addToken(string,string,address).details: Add a new token with its price oracle

calculatePotentialReward(uint256,address.details: Calculate potential reward for a user

canResolveBet(uint256).details: Check if bet can be resolved

claimReward(uint256).details: Claim reward for a winning bet

createBet(bytes32).details: Create a new betting round for specific token (called by Telegram bot)

getActiveBetsForTokens(bytes32[]).details: Get active bets for multiple tokens

getBetParticipants(uint256).details: Get all participants for a specific bet

params._betId: The ID of the bet to get participants for

returns._0: Array of addresses that participated in the bet

getLatestPrice(bytes32).details: Get latest price for a token

getTokenBetHistory(bytes32).details: Get bet history for a specific token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

placeBet(uint256,uint8).details: Place a bet on price direction

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resolveBet(uint256).details: Resolve a bet (can be called by anyone after bet ends)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateTokenOracle(bytes32,address).details: Update price oracle for existing token
